custom-action.name: buildwhiteblocknetwork_2
custom-action.description:
Build a BlockChain Network.
Possible parameters are: - Organization (required): The name or id of the organization to deploy one Default value is "The name or id of the organization to deploy one". - TestDefinition (required): The path to the Whiteblock Genesis test definition yaml file Default value is "${NL-CustomResources}/youFile.yaml". - AccessToken (required): You can get this by running the command genesis auth print-access-token Default value is "A Whiteblock Genesis access token". - StartPhase (required): Choose a phase in your test during which you want to start the load test Default value is "The phase at which to start the load test". - TraceMode (optional): enable loggin details : true: enable ; false : Disable Default value is "enable logging ".
